text_blocks.content: From [redacted] To [redacted] NYM/Executive Staff Date 2019/07/26 10:10 Subject Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm
Good morning all, Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
